title: (x) Lady Gaga & Beyonce / fat curly unconnected script - Candice {R}
content:
I just stumbled on this ... Groovy, display font. Ideas, anyone?

comments.content: This is [Candice](http://web.archive.org/web/20100315094056/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/itc/candice_com_regular/?&sample_text=Beyonc%C3%A9&sample_size=96&update=0) — it never seems to grow old.
